review: Weird as fk, yet extremely enjoyable. The experience was akin to:a. Oh wow let's try this game.b. Put on headphones plus play in the dark 'cause it said horror.c. CLOSE YOUR EYESd. scary voice acting pew pewe. wtf character, wtf story, wtf visualsf. starting to enjoy the game's puzzle and (fake) jumpscare anticipation (which doesn't really happen though, but you expect it to happen)g. wait, the game's OVER?!So yeah. Definitely recommend. No fuss, just play. Hurray.
